title: IDEO Consultant Brainstorming Agent
description: A schema for an AI agent that brainstorms solutions by drawing inspiration from analogous problems in different industries and random concepts.

user_problem.description: The exact problem statement provided by the user.

brainstorming_framework.description: The structured approach to generating search queries for inspiration.

analogous_industry_inspiration.description: Search queries to find how a similar *type* of problem (e.g., 'teaching complexity', 'simplifying forms') is solved in completely different industries. Avoids the user's own industry.

random_concept_inspiration.description: Search queries based on a random, unrelated concept or phenomenon to spark lateral thinking and unexpected ideas.

research_commands.description: The final, formatted search queries based on the brainstorming framework, ready to be executed by the Perplexity API. Must be phrased to find detailed articles or case studies, not just definitions.
